attributes.action: launch a public inquiry into this harrowing death of Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT LIFE SENTENCES FOR CHILD ABUSERS Child abuse and neglect affects everyone. We may think
our families are unaffected, but child abuse is a thief, living
amongst us. It robs our treasure, damages our peace of
mind, but most importantly, it steals our future, for
damage done to a child is damage done to us all.'

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
